DOC.brief_summary: This study multi-center , randomize prospective trial 6-month follow . A newly develop treatment education module test compare waiting-list control group . The module cover topic `` diabetes travel '' . Primary outcome variable diabetes-specific empowerment regard diabetes travel . Secondary outcome variable : diabetes-related distress , health-related quality life , depressive symptom , self-care behavior , glycemic control .
DOC.brief_title: Diabetes Travel : Evaluation Diabetes Education Module - Randomized Controlled Trial ( PRIMO_Travel )
DOC.detailed_description: The module consist one lesson ( duration : 90 minute ) . The module derive empowerment approach base previously evaluate education treatment program type 1 diabetes : PRIMAS ( NCT01220557 ) . The module design group session hold trained diabetes educator . Patients randomize either immediate participation module control group . Control group waiting-list control group . Patients waiting-list control group get education completion 6-month follow-up .
DOC.criteria: Intensive insulin treatment specific interest `` Diabetes Travel '' wish participate group education inform consent fluent read speaking German language diabetes duration < 4 week severe organic disease ( e.g . terminal renal disease , cancer poor prognosis ) current treatment mental disease cognitive impairment dementia pregnancy
